basicInfo.name: Vanessa
basicInfo.flavor: Vanessa studied magic on her own and became the master of time. She managed to return to the present day with her father's help, but decades had passed since she disappeared.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Sandstorm
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 95% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 70% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase. [Increased by: 19s]
 - 70% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase. [Increased by: 23s]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Skill Cooldown Increase becomes 23s.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).

Skill 2.name: Waves of Sand
Skill 2.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 70% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 82% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Petrify chance becomes 50%.

Passive.name: Mage of the Desert
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Turns: All Damage Immunity duration becomes 3 turn(s).
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 24%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - All Enemies
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 24% Magic Vulnerability upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Rachel, Eileene, soup, roasted meat, fruit, challenging spirit, romance, adventure, travel, studying
profile.story: Vanessa studied magic on her own and became the master of time. She managed to return to the present day with her father's help, but decades had passed since she disappeared.

basicInfo.name: Vanessa
basicInfo.flavor: Vanessa wandered through time, oscillating between past and future whenever the sand in her hourglass ran out. Although her magic and spirit matured during these journeys, her physical form has remained the same as it was in her youth.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Sandstorm
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 85% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 70% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase. [Increased by: 16s]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Waves of Sand
Skill 2.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 62% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 62% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Mage of the Desert
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]

profile.story: Vanessa wandered through time, oscillating between past and future whenever the sand in her hourglass ran out. Although her magic and spirit matured during these journeys, her physical form has remained the same as it was in her youth.

basicInfo.name: Vanessa
basicInfo.flavor: Even though Vanessa is a descendant of mages, her parents did not allow her to learn magic properly. While she and some friends were playing with magic tools without her parents' knowledge, she got sucked into an hourglass.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 75% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase. [Increased by: 12s]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack.

4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 57% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 30% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 57% of Physical Attack.

 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
